location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Captain David Seton, Resident at Muscat

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has obscured some of the opening body of the letter on f. 87v. As a result, the text in this area is difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter concerns intercepted correspondence from two French officers, known to be travelling through the region, that have been intercepted and forwarded to Captain John Ferrier.
